Brief:

"Sentral for Parents" is an intuitive mobile application designed to bridge the communication gap between parents and schools. This platform provides an easy-to-navigate dashboard that allows parents to stay up-to-date with their child's academic progress, attendance, and school events right from their smartphone.

Core Features:

  • Student Academic Progress Tracker üìò: Monitors the child's grades and assignments to keep parents informed about academic performance.
  • Attendance Insights üïí: Provides real-time updates on the child's attendance and absences.
  • Event Calendar üìÖ: Keeps parents in the loop about upcoming school events, meetings, and important dates.
  • Direct Messaging üí¨: Facilitates communication between parents and teachers for quick and easy discussion about a child's needs or concerns.
  • Real-Time Notifications üîî: Sends alerts for any significant updates or emergencies related to the school or the child‚Äôs academic life.

  • Enhanced Communication üëç: Improves the flow of information from school to home, ensuring parents are always informed.
  • Convenience üëç: All essential information is accessible from a single app, saving time for parents.
  • Improved Parental Engagement üëç: Encourages active parental involvement in their child's education through easily accessible data.
  • User-Friendly Interface üëç: The app is designed with simplicity in mind, making it easy for anyone to navigate.

Cons:
